Class XOHeuristic

java.lang.Object
XOHeuristic
public class XOHeuristic extends Object
Used for applying hill climbing heuristics to solutions.

    returnChildMemeplex (SolutionPop problem, int p1_index, int p2_index)

    singlePointXO (SolutionPop problem, int p1_index, int p2_index)

    int[][]
    uniformXO (SolutionPop problem, int p1_index, int p2_index)

  • Method Details

    • returnChildMemeplex

      public double[] returnChildMemeplex (SolutionPop problem, int p1_index, int p2_index)

      Performs comparisons between the parent solutions in order to decide which memeplex the child solutions will inherit.

      Parameters:
      problem - Used to calculate objective values and get information from the meme store.
      p1_index - Index of first parent.
      p2_index - Index of second parent.
      Returns:
      memeplex that the child solutions will be using.

    • uniformXO

      public int[][] uniformXO (SolutionPop problem, int p1_index, int p2_index)

      Goes over each bit in the parent solutions and has a chance of swapping them (based on xo_rate).

      Parameters:
      problem - Used to get binary representations of parent solutions.
      p1_index - Index of parent 1 for crossover.
      p2_index - Index of parent 2 for crossover.
      Returns:
      array containing child solutions that resulted from crossover.

    • doublePointXO

      public int[][] doublePointXO (SolutionPop problem, int p1_index, int p2_index)

      Chooses two unique indexes for the parents and swaps bits around these two points.

      Parameters:
      problem - Used to get binary representations of parent solutions.
      p1_index - Index of parent 1 for crossover.
      p2_index - Index of parent 2 for crossover.
      Returns:
      array containing child solutions that resulted from crossover.

    • singlePointXO

      public int[][] singlePointXO (SolutionPop problem, int p1_index, int p2_index)

      Chooses an index for the parents and swaps every bit before and including that index.

      Parameters:
      problem - Used to get binary representations of parent solutions.
      p1_index - Index of parent 1 for crossover.
      p2_index - Index of parent 2 for crossover.
      Returns:
      array containing child solutions that resulted from crossover.
